TopicTitle: Logo contest results: for v. 0.24 or later? I'm guessing later?

Articles.Content: Since the developers are currently swamped and will probably be so for the foreseeable future, would the logo contest results be seen in game in the v. 0.24 update or in a probable later update? Thanks in advance!
Update .24 probably wont be out until at least a few weeks, so I would expect the results sometime around then.
There will probably be a blog post about it. When, I cannot say.
